Home.headline: Stress-free group cooking on vacation
Home.sub: Plan meals, fairly assign cooks and helpers, add recipes, and get AI-generated daily grocery lists. Everyone eats, nobody burns out.

f1.title: Smart schedule
f1.desc: Preference-weighted, availability-aware pairing for each meal.

f2.title: Recipes & groceries
f2.desc: Assign dishes and auto-generate a concise shopping list per day.

f3.title: Invite & share
f3.desc: Invite links for self-join, plus ICS calendar export of the plan.
